verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> to Nob <S%H5011><s%> to Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> the priest: <S%H3548><s%> and Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> was afraid <S%H2729><s%> at the meeting <S%H7125><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Why <S%H4069><s%> are you alone, <S%H905><s%> and no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H376><s%> with you?

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> The king <S%H4428><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> me a business, <S%H1697><s%> and has said <S%H559><s%> to me, Let no <S%H408><s%> man <S%H376><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> any <S%H3972><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> of the business <S%H1697><s%> about which <S%H834><s%> I send <S%H7971><s%> you, and what <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you: and I have appointed <S%H3045><s%> my servants <S%H5288><s%> to such <S%H492><s%> and such <S%H492><s%> a place. <S%H4725><s%>

Now therefore what <S%H4100><s%> is under <S%H8478><s%> your hand? <S%H3027><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me five <S%H2568><s%> loaves of bread <S%H3899><s%> in my hand, <S%H3027><s%> or <S%H176><s%> what there is present. <S%H4672><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> There is no <S%H369><s%> common <S%H2455><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> my hand, <S%H3027><s%> but there is hallowed <S%H6944><s%> bread; <S%H3899><s%> if <S%H518><s%> the young <S%H5288><s%> men have kept <S%H8104><s%> themselves at <S%H389><s%> least <S%H389><s%> from women. <S%H802><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Of a truth <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> women <S%H802><s%> have been kept <S%H6113><s%> from us about these three <S%H8032><s%> days, <S%H8543><s%> since I came <S%H3318><s%> out, and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the young <S%H5288><s%> men are holy, <S%H6944><s%> and the bread is in a manner <S%H1870><s%> common, <S%H2455><s%> yes, <S%H637><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> it were sanctified <S%H6942><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> in the vessel. <S%H3627><s%>

So the priest <S%H3548><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him hallowed <S%H6944><s%> bread: for there was no <S%H3808><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> but the show bread, <S%H3899><s%> <S%H6440><s%> that was taken <S%H5493><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to put <S%H7760><s%> hot <S%H2527><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when it was taken <S%H3947><s%> away.

Now a certain man <S%H376><s%> of the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> was there that day, <S%H3117><s%> detained <S%H6113><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> was Doeg, <S%H1673><s%> an Edomite, <S%H130><s%> the most chief <S%H47><s%> of the herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> that belonged to Saul. <S%H7586><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Ahimelech, <S%H288><s%> And is there not here <S%H6311><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> spear <S%H2595><s%> or <S%H176><s%> sword? <S%H2719><s%> for I have neither <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3808><s%> brought <S%H3947><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> nor <S%H1571><s%> my weapons <S%H3627><s%> with me, because <S%H3588><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> business <S%H1697><s%> required <S%H1961><s%> haste. <S%H5169><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> The sword <S%H2719><s%> of Goliath <S%H1555><s%> the Philistine, <S%H6430><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you slew <S%H5221><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Elah, <S%H425><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is here wrapped <S%H3874><s%> in a cloth <S%H8071><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> the ephod: <S%H646><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you will take <S%H3947><s%> that, take <S%H3947><s%> it: for there is no <S%H369><s%> other <S%H312><s%> save <S%H2108><s%> that here. <S%H2088><s%> And David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> There is none <S%H369><s%> like that; give <S%H5414><s%> it me.

And David <S%H1732><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>and fled <S%H1272><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> for fear <S%H6440><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> to Achish <S%H397><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gath. <S%H1661><s%>

And the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Achish <S%H397><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Is not this <S%H2088><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the land? <S%H776><s%> did they not sing <S%H6030><s%> one to another of him in dances, <S%H4246><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> has slain <S%H5221><s%> his thousands, <S%H505><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> his ten <S%H7233><s%> thousands? <S%H7233><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> laid <S%H7760><s%> up these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in his heart, <S%H3824><s%> and was sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> of Achish <S%H397><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gath. <S%H1661><s%>

And he changed <S%H8138><s%> his behavior <S%H2940><s%> before <S%H5869><s%> them, and feigned himself mad <S%H1984><s%> in their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and scrabbled <S%H8427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and let his spittle <S%H7388><s%> fall <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on his beard. <S%H2206><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Achish <S%H397><s%> to his servants, <S%H5650><s%> See, <S%H2009><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> is mad: <S%H7696><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> then have you brought <S%H935><s%> him to me?

Have I need <S%H2638><s%> of mad <S%H7696><s%> men, that you have brought <S%H935><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> fellow to play the mad <S%H7696><s%> man in my presence? <S%H5921><s%> shall this <S%H2088><s%> fellow come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> my house? <S%H1004><s%>
